feed.title: Adriano D’Alessandro
feed.subtitle: I’m a computer vision researcher and PhD candidate living in Vancouver. My work focuses on object counting with limited data, and lately, I’ve been diving into using synthetic data from latent diffusion models to train counting models. I’m also into things like plant agriculture and biodiversity—basically, anywhere counting and nature intersect in interesting ways.

entry.title: The Number Sense Challenge for LLMs

link.title: The Number Sense Challenge for LLMs
